question: What are some side effects from Radiation?  My father lives in Athens, Georgia and he was diagnosed with prostate cancer this year and he is taking the radiation.  Then within the last 2 weeks he was diagnosed with diabetes and had to go to the hospital and he is back in there in the matter of 2 weeks with a bloodclot or fluid in his lungs. Could the radiation be causing these problems or what?
title: Signs and Symtoms of Radiation
